statements: UPDATE women_rights_advocates_documents SET publication_year = 2022 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE women_rights_advocates_documents SET document_title = 'Empowering Women' WHERE author_name = 'Alice Smith';
UPDATE women_rights_advocates_documents SET document_title = 'Empowerment Guide', author_name = 'Alice Jones' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE women_rights_advocates_documents SET publication_year = 2022, archived_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE document_type = 'Research Paper';
UPDATE WomenRightsAdvocates SET occupation = 'Activist' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE HistoricalDocuments SET publication_date = '1920-08-26', document_text = 'This document is crucial for women's rights.' WHERE document_id = 3;
UPDATE WomenRightsAdvocates SET email='newemail@example.com', occupation='Activist' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE HistoricalDocuments SET document_text='Updated document text.', publication_date='1850-08-03' WHERE document_id=2;
UPDATE HistoricalDocuments SET author='Jane Doe', publication_year=2000 WHERE document_id=1;
UPDATE WomenAdvocates SET birth_year=1980, biography='An advocate for women rights' WHERE advocate_id=2;
UPDATE HistoricalDocuments SET publication_year = 2000, document_text = 'Updated text' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE WomenAdvocates SET birth_year = 1980, biography = 'New biography' WHERE advocate_id = 3;
UPDATE documents SET document_title = 'Updated Title', document_content = 'Updated Content' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE speeches SET speaker_name = 'New Speaker', speech_transcript = 'New Transcript' WHERE speech_id = 2;
UPDATE documents SET document_title = 'Updated Title', document_author = 'New Author', document_date = '2022-01-01', document_content = 'Updated content' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE speeches SET speaker_name = 'Updated Speaker', speech_date = '2022-02-15', speech_transcript = 'Updated transcript' WHERE speech_id = 2;

UPDATE quotes SET quote_text = 'Change is the only constant' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE historical_documents SET document_title = 'Updated Document Title', document_text = 'Updated Document Text' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE organizations SET headquarters_location = 'New Headquarters Location', founding_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE organization_name = 'New Organization';
